name: commensally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving a relationship between two species (= sets of animals or plants in which the members have similar characteristics to each other and can breed with each other) in which one gets an advantage from living closely with the other and the other is not affected by it: Eight species of worm were found in this area living commensally with other animals. This beautiful little crab lives commensally amongst the tentacles of giant anemones.
More examplesFewer examplesHuman beings commensally support an extensive microbial flora on the skin.They live commensally in the burrows of crustaceans.
